name: Cabinet d'avocats SAMMAN
goal:
SAMMAN Law & Corporate Affairs is one of the few French law firms specializing in public and regulatory affairs and practicing in both Paris and Brussels.
Our expertise lays on: a cross-practice team of lawyers and consultants with multiple areas of specialization; the double location of our office in Paris and Brussels; and a strong and innovative vision of the legal profession.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Legislative and non-legislative initiatives falling under the following EU policy areas:

Digital Single Market;

Capital Markets Union;

Internal Market;

Trade.
